Reviews.Title: Not happy.....
Reviews.Author: GolfnNut
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop after reading several reviews.  The seller sent it with an fraudulent Windows 7 OS.  Would not recommend purchasing from this seller.  Took 2 days, and several hours on the phone with both Dell and Microsoft to resolve the situation.  The last technician that I spoke to finally diagnosed the problem.....a fraudulent Windows 7 OS, he determined that as the Product Key was unusable, plus I kept getting a message that I could be a victim of fraud.  Microsoft finally sent me a legal copy of WIndows 7 OS.  The Dell technician told me he was going to report the seller to Microsoft, as I did too.  I also complained to Amazon, and recommended this seller be removed from their site.  TigerDirect was NOT the seller of this item...just wanted to make that clear.

Reviews.Title: totally happy!
Reviews.Author: D. henry
Reviews.Content: got this to replace our 6 year old Dell Studio 17 that was starting to get pretty tired.  This i17R is very nice.  The 8G Ram is fantastic and really has improved the performance over the 4G ram that our old studio 17 had.  good screen.  Boots quickly.  Keyboard is just a little mushy, but not an issue.I would have given it 5 stars, BUT IT NEEDS A BACK LIGHTED KEYBOARD.  That is my only complaint. However, I am very pleased with this machine!! We saved money and sales tax by getting it on amazon (saved about $100 over buying it locally at walmart here in Peoria, IL)  Win, Win!!!Update: 6 months later: The keyboard has always had an issue with the (") quote key.  It does not place the " on the keyboard until after you type it & then have to hit the space key.  I should request customer support, but too lazy to mess with dell customer support for such a small issue.  Other than that, computer working fine.  Still wish the keyboard was back light.Good Luck! DK

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron i17R-2895SLV 17-Inch Laptop (Silver)
Reviews.Author: DOUGLAS D. JOHNSON SR.
Reviews.Content: I love my laptop. Large screen, fast, fast, fast. The laptop vents out of the side so my lap stays cool.

Reviews.Title: Hospice Use
Reviews.Author: Martha C. McDurmond
Reviews.Content: Absolutely no complaints here.  Staff uses laptops out in the field.  This laptop came highly recommended by our IT guy.  Great product.  In fact, have ordered another one.

Reviews.Title: dell computer
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth C. Gately "Hunter"
Reviews.Content: I don't think it was new. maybe refurbished. I did not know I would hate windows 7's photo storage programs.

Reviews.Title: heavy
Reviews.Author: banshaker
Reviews.Content: I had to return it because it is too heavy . I compared it to my old inspiron and I do prefer my old one as far as the weight is concerned.

Reviews.Title: No backlit keyboard
Reviews.Author: Marv
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop. Powerful and great for games I play. Not the best graphics and no backlit keyboard but for the price, Awesome!

Reviews.Title: As Advertised?
Reviews.Author: Ted Hunt
Reviews.Content: This is a full feature widescreen laptop that performs as expected.The specifications given on the Amazon site advertise an "Intel Core_i7_3612QM Processor 2.1GHz" processor.The laptop is labeled as having a Core i3 processor.  This is a great processor, but elderly.  The advertised clock speed is consistent with the i3 processor.

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop
Reviews.Author: jerbear1953
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace my wifes 3 year old dell laptop and figured go more ram more memory and faster on everything,,She loves it..

Reviews.Title: Powerful laptop at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Digital Dave
Reviews.Content: This laptop out of the box, worked beautifully.  Was able to easily install all my programs.  Great combination of size, storage capability and processing speed.  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Great computer at the Price. $549 used.
Reviews.Author: Bigbob
Reviews.Content: Great computer. Does everything I need and does it effortly. Only Problem I had was the  image backup kept the prior owners Info.Luv the machine and is great to have fastest processor, memory, hard drive availiable, at a reasonable  price.

Reviews.Title: Key board is useless without direct overhead lighting.
Reviews.Author: David L. Laidig
Reviews.Content: Pros: This machine is fast. That's it, sorry!Cons: The non-back lit black key board is useless without direct overhead lighting. The screen provides enough light for a silver key board, but not black. The key board cannot be upgraded with a back-lit one as this computer has no zif connector. The sound system is just not acceptable for a machine in this category. The power cord need to be at 90 degrees. Cammon Dell! Do not buy this machine! Buy an XPS. That is exactly what I did.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop! It's the best I've ever had. My last laptop crashed and I wanted to get one that would have the space I needed, run the programs I wanted, and so much more and this one does everything I need it to do and more.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied so far
Reviews.Author: Thomas Wolfe
Reviews.Content: fast, smooth, easy. very good for the basics that I do. sometimes the Dell extras get a little annoying. but that's me. a lot of users would probably like them more than I do.

Reviews.Title: 17 inch Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: ROSE 1ST TWIN
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a second laptop for our household and I am so pleased with the quality of this product. Some of the features that are on it are a little difficult to understand but over all I am very happy with this computer. The price proved to be a fantastic value for a Windows 7 product.

Reviews.Title: A great laptop!
Reviews.Author: Ellie Lynne "Ellie Lynne"
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my boyfriend for Christmas and he absolutely adores it! He loves the size of the screen, the number keypad on the keyboard, and now he has Windows 7. Dell products have always been wonderful to us in the past, and now they've done it again with this laptop!

Reviews.Title: very nice laptop
Reviews.Author: gusi
Reviews.Content: It's very nice and powerful laptop, if you don't need it for gaming, I run 3 systems on wmvare player over the windows 7, each have one processor and 2GB ram and works great.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Dell believer
Reviews.Content: Received my dell computer about 2 weeks ago. I am really enjoying using it, it is fast and have had no problem with it at all. I love the keyboard makes cleaning it a breeze. Had a really bad laptop before getting this one so I'm planning on staying with a dell from now on.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Gilberto Ramos
Reviews.Content: Pro: this laptop is exactly as described, not more not less. You can read the products details and if you are looking for a machine like this it will make you happy as I was when I received it.Cons: The lack of light for the keyboard really annoyed me.

Reviews.Title: great Dell
Reviews.Author: kenly777
Reviews.Content: Very fast computer. Nice and sturdy! Would have liked the backlit keyboard that I had on my last laptop, but the placement of the other buttons (ie. on/off switch) make this one very resistant to damage.

Reviews.Title: Came configured incorrectly but otherwise great
Reviews.Author: VeronicaThxForComingBy
Reviews.Content: Amazon was useless when I contacted customer support about what seemed to be a problem with the keyboard; just recommended I contact Dell for a replacement.  It turns out it was just defaulted to a U.S. International keyboard that works differently with many keys on the right side.  Dell also let me know that I can change a preference so that the "Fn" orange versions of the keys default to the orange action without needing to press the Fn button only located on the left side of the keyboard (extremely annoying when one only wants to pause anything playing because these used to be buttons on the very front of Inspiron laptops...)

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: carlos loria gutierrez
Reviews.Content: i just start using it, and i have no complains, no issues. i am very happy with my purchaise. i recomend this seller and this product. i still working on it but it seems to be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Excellent - 5 stars except -
Reviews.Author: Bill Hansen "Bill Hansen"
Reviews.Content: Dec 11, 2012 - This is an almost complete re-writing of this review. The computer itself is worthy of 5 stars. It's fast and powerful, with an excellent screen and keyboard. The build quality is very good. If you get a good sample, it's probably one of the best laptops you could buy, and it's a great value at the price.However, if you get one which doesn't work properly in any respect, think very carefully about whether you want to try working with Dell  customer support or Dell technical support. The first sample of the 17S Special Edition I received was badly flawed. It couldn't do backups larger than a few megabytes (yes, that's megabytes, not gigabytes) and it would not play many of the online videos (YouTube, Vimeo) I was used to playing on my other computers. Over the next *SIX WEEKS*, I spent dozens of hours "on hold" and trying to work with Dell tech reps to solve these problems. The reps actually made the computer's problems much worse. Öne "senior rep" tried to tell me this was "a software problem" and therefore Dell was not obligated to help with it. Eventually a friend who is an IT person for a local firm confirmed my suspicion that the computer's hard drive was fatally flawed. Two different Dell senior tech reps denied my request to return the computer for replacement, or for refund. After a lot of prodding and patience on my part, Dell eventually agreed to send a replacement.I do want to say that there were two Dell reps, one a very junior tech rep and the other a senior support rep, who were wonderful. The junior rep stayed with me throughout the long and very frustrating process, and the final senior rep was a model of what a good support rep should be. Both of them returned phone calls, and both phoned me to report progress even when I hadn't asked for phone calls. So not all Dell tech or support people are ineffective.*===>The replacement laptop was quick and easy to set up, and it has worked just as it should work, "right out of the box". I love it. Again - this is a computer worthy of a 5 star rating. But be very careful if you need to work with Dell technical people.If anyone's interested in more details, I've left part of my original review below the asterisks. There's a lot more to this tale than I related in that review. If anyone wants more details, communicate with me privately and I'll supply them.****************************************************************************[from the original review]..... But it has some bugs which make it almost unuseable. I use computers for photo and video editing and storage, so frequent backups of data are essential. I've never had trouble making backups of computer data before this computer. But none of the three backup programs I've tried, including Windows Backup, Acronis True Image, and Handybackup, will make a backup on this laptop. Also, it cannot view or play about half of the online videos I try to access. On four (yes, four!) occasions, I've spent hours on the phone with Dell tech reps, shuttled back and forth to different phone numbers with lengthy periods "on hold" - three solid hours on the phone this morning alone -  but I have not received any useful help from the Dell telephone support personell. A rep from the Dell online "chat" support claimed that the factory installation of Windows 7 is the problem. She said she would have Dell send a Windows disc.....so I'll need to wipe my HD clean, do a clean installation of Windows, and hope that helps. However, there are no guarantees even then.[Added Dec 11, 2012 - the OEM Windows 7 disc from Dell did not help. The disc would not recognize the computer's hard drive! My friend the IT person confirmed that this was an unsolveable problem. Possibly it could have been resolved if I bought and installed a new HD, but then would the videos have played as they should have?]

Reviews.Title: One happy camper
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: This laptop does everything I could possibly need at lightning speed. When ordering I had the Dell rep online and even after trying to match the Amazon price he gave up and told me to go for it because it was a great deal. My co-workers are all jealous.

Reviews.Title: deklly
Reviews.Author: ace
Reviews.Content: I Have just brough this computer but can i 3d games such  as mw3 warcraft aion league of legends  my model is 5720 intel r core tm i5-3210m cpu @ 2.50GHz 2.50 GHz 8.00 gb ram 62-bit operating system grahpic is
